structure.questionText: The North Platte River ______ from Wyoming into Nebraska.
structure.explanation: Kalimat ini membutuhkan kata kerja utama (main verb). 'Flows' adalah satu-satunya kata kerja tunggal yang tepat untuk subjek 'The North Platte River'.

structure.questionText: ______ Biloxi received its name from a Sioux word meaning 'first people'.
structure.explanation: Kalimat ini membutuhkan subjek. 'The city of' melengkapi subjek 'Biloxi' menjadi frasa benda yang utuh.

structure.questionText: A pride of lions ______ up to forty lions, including one to three males, several females, and cubs.
structure.explanation: Subjek kalimat adalah 'A pride' (tunggal). 'Can contain' adalah kata kerja modal yang benar.

structure.questionText: ______ tea plant are small and white.
structure.explanation: Predikatnya adalah 'are' (jamak), jadi subjeknya harus jamak. 'The flowers of the' menyediakan subjek jamak ('flowers').

structure.questionText: The tetracyclines, ______ antibiotics, are used to treat infections.
structure.explanation: Ini adalah bentuk Appositive. Struktur yang benar adalah 'Subject, Appositive, Verb'. 'A family of' berfungsi sebagai appositive.

structure.questionText: Any possible academic assistance from taking stimulants ______ marginal at best.
structure.explanation: Subjek utamanya adalah 'Any possible academic assistance' (tunggal). Maka kata kerjanya adalah 'is'.

structure.questionText: Henry Adams, born in Boston, ______ famous as a historian and novelist.
structure.explanation: Kalimat ini sudah memiliki subjek 'Henry Adams' dan modifier. Yang dibutuhkan hanya kata kerja utama: 'became'.

structure.questionText: The major cause ______ the pull of the Moon on the Earth.
options: of the tides in the ocean
structure.explanation: Struktur kalimat: Subject + Verb + Object. 'The major cause of ocean tides' adalah subjek lengkap, dan 'is' adalah kata kerjanya.

structure.questionText: Still a novelty in the late nineteenth century, ______ limited to the rich.
structure.explanation: Frasa di awal adalah modifier. Setelah koma, harus diikuti langsung oleh subjek yang dijelaskan (photography) lalu kata kerja (was).

structure.questionText: A computerized map of the freeways using information gathered by sensors ______ on a local cable channel during rush hours.
structure.explanation: Subjek utamanya adalah 'A computerized map' (tunggal). Maka kata kerjanya harus tunggal: 'airs'.

structure.questionText: Usually, the more skilled an athlete, ______ more money he or she earns.
structure.explanation: Ini adalah bentuk 'Double Comparative': The more..., the more... (Semakin..., semakin...).

structure.questionText: ______ the mass of the object is difficult without a scale.
structure.explanation: Infinitive 'To determine' dapat berfungsi sebagai subjek kalimat.

structure.questionText: The reactor core of a nuclear power plant is enclosed in concrete ______ radiation.
structure.explanation: Gunakan 'to + verb' (infinitive of purpose) untuk menunjukkan tujuan. 'To prevent' (untuk mencegah).

structure.questionText: ______ political party in the United States.
structure.explanation: 'No' digunakan sebelum kata benda (noun phrase) untuk menunjukkan ketiadaan.

structure.questionText: The committee has met and ______.
structure.explanation: 'The committee' dianggap tunggal (collective noun), jadi gunakan 'it'. Struktur harus paralel: 'has met and (has) reached'.

structure.questionText: Alfred Adams has not ______ lived lonely in times of sorrow.
structure.explanation: Pola 'not only... but also'. Di sini konteksnya mengarah pada 'not only'.

structure.questionText: Juana Ines de la Cruz ______ a nun in 1667 to devote her life to writing.
structure.explanation: Dibutuhkan kata kerja utama bentuk lampau (past tense) untuk subjek 'Juana Ines de la Cruz'. Jawabannya 'became'.

structure.questionText: A premise is a statement ______ as a basis for reasoning.
structure.explanation: Ini adalah reduksi dari adjective clause 'which serves'. Menjadi 'serving' (Active participle).

structure.questionText: Of all the cereals, rice is the one ______ food for more people than any other grain.
structure.explanation: Dibutuhkan relative pronoun 'that' + verb untuk menjelaskan 'the one'.

structure.questionText: ______ wooden buildings helps to protect them from damage due to weather.
structure.explanation: Gerund ('Painting') dapat berfungsi sebagai subjek kalimat.

structure.questionText: Not only ______ shade and beauty, but they also reduce carbon dioxide.
structure.explanation: Jika kalimat dimulai dengan 'Not only', maka harus terjadi Inversi (Auxiliary + Subject + Verb). 'Do trees provide' adalah inversi yang benar.

structure.questionText: ______ in the atmosphere is the temperature falling below freezing.
structure.explanation: Noun clause 'What produces frost' berfungsi sebagai subjek kalimat.

structure.questionText: Lambert's sunfish, a small freshwater fish, ______ for the distinctive red spot on its ear.
structure.explanation: Kalimat pasif. Ikan tersebut 'dinamai' (is named).

structure.questionText: Unless protected areas are established, the Bengal tiger ______ extinct.
structure.explanation: Conditional sentence. 'Might become' menunjukkan kemungkinan di masa depan.

structure.questionText: Before the 1800s, ______ of cotton was done by hand.
structure.explanation: Dibutuhkan noun phrase sebagai subjek. 'The picking' (proses pemetikan) adalah yang paling tepat.

structure.questionText: Unlike the Earth, which rotates once every twenty-four hours, ______ once every ten hours.
structure.explanation: Setelah frasa pembanding 'Unlike...', harus diikuti oleh subjek yang dibandingkan (Jupiter) dan kata kerja (rotates).

structure.questionText: Jacksonville, Florida, ______ to be the largest city in the United States.
structure.explanation: Subjek 'Jacksonville' membutuhkan kata kerja utama. 'Claims' adalah simple present tense yang tepat.

structure.questionText: The skull of a mammal ______ of different bones.
structure.explanation: Kalimat pasif. Tengkorak 'is made up of' (terdiri dari/dibuat dari) tulang.

structure.questionText: Using a globe can be ______ to visualize the geography of the world.
structure.explanation: Dalam konteks ini, seringkali membandingkan dengan metode lain (implisit), jadi comparative 'easier' sering digunakan.

structure.questionText: Only when the ground is kept moist ______ germinate.
structure.explanation: Kalimat dimulai dengan 'Only when...', menuntut Inversi di klausa utama: Auxiliary (will) + Subject (grass seeds).

structure.questionText: ______ widely used in the chemical industry, sodium carbonate is a principal ingredient in soap.
structure.explanation: Dibutuhkan konjungsi. 'Though (it is) widely used...'.

structure.questionText: Glass that has been tempered may be up to ______.
options: five times as hard as ordinary glass
as hard as ordinary glass five times
harder as ordinary glass five times
ordinary glass as hard as five times
structure.explanation: Urutan perbandingan: Multiple number + times + as + adjective + as + noun.

structure.questionText: Arizona ______ a very dry climate.
structure.explanation: Kalimat sederhana Subject + Verb. Arizona has (memiliki).

structure.questionText: One of the most important tools ______ by geologists is the hammer.
structure.explanation: Reduced adjective clause. Aslinya: '...tools (which are) used by...'.

structure.questionText: Native American languages are often ______ than European languages.
structure.explanation: Comparative adjective. Karena ada 'than', gunakan 'more complex'.

structure.questionText: Duncan Mayo, ______ of the early west, was actually born in Scotland.
structure.explanation: Appositive phrase. Menjelaskan subjek 'Duncan Mayo' tanpa perlu kata kerja baru.

structure.questionText: X-rays are able to pass through objects ______ visible light cannot.
structure.explanation: Relative clause menjelaskan 'objects'. 'That' digunakan sebagai konektor/objek.

structure.questionText: ______ to the Moon, the Apollo astronauts took many photographs.
structure.explanation: Frasa preposisi 'On their way to the Moon' berfungsi sebagai keterangan yang tepat.

structure.questionText: Gunpowder, in some ways the most effective of all the explosive substances, ______ a mixture of potassium nitrate, charcoal, and sulfur.
structure.explanation: Subjeknya 'Gunpowder' (tunggal/uncountable), jadi verb-nya 'is'.

structure.questionText: If water is heated to 212 degrees Fahrenheit, ______ as steam.
structure.explanation: Conditional sentence type 0/1 (General truth). Subject (it) + Verb (boils).

structure.questionText: The higher the temperature of a molecule, ______.
structure.explanation: Double Comparative. Pola 'The more..., the more...'. Jawaban yang tepat mengikuti pola 'the + comparative + subject + verb'.

structure.questionText: ______ related to the hippopotamus, the whale is a mammal.
structure.explanation: Reduced Adjective Clause/Conjunction. Kalimat lengkapnya 'Although (it is) related...'. 'Despite' harus diikuti noun phrase, sedangkan 'related' adalah participle.

structure.questionText: ______ in 1776, the Declaration of Independence is one of the most important documents in US history.
structure.explanation: Past Participle Phrase. Dokumen tersebut 'ditulis' (pasif), jadi gunakan V3 (Written) di awal kalimat sebagai modifier.

structure.questionText: Only after food has been dried ______ stored for later consumption.
structure.explanation: Inversion. Kalimat diawali dengan 'Only after...', maka klausa utama harus diinversi (Auxiliary + Subject + Verb).

structure.questionText: The giant panda is ______ to become extinct.
structure.explanation: Passive Voice / Adjective. 'Threatened' (terancam) paling tepat secara gramatikal dan makna. Jika pakai 'danger', harusnya 'in danger of becoming'.

structure.questionText: Neptune is ______ any other planet in the solar system.
structure.explanation: Comparative. Dibutuhkan struktur perbandingan lengkap: 'further... than'.

structure.questionText: ______ is the study of the nervous system.
structure.explanation: Missing Subject. Kalimat membutuhkan subjek tunggal. 'Neurology' adalah subjek yang tepat.

structure.questionText: Generally, the knifefish ______ electric fields to navigate.
structure.explanation: Subject-Verb Agreement. Subjek 'the knifefish' (sebagai spesies tunggal) membutuhkan verb tunggal 'uses'.

structure.questionText: The seed of the flax plant ______ oil.
structure.explanation: Subject-Verb Agreement. Subjek intinya adalah 'seed' (tunggal), bukan 'plants'. Jadi verb-nya 'yields'.

structure.questionText: ______ a busy city, Pompeii was destroyed by the eruption of Mount Vesuvius.
structure.explanation: Appositive/Modifier. 'Once a busy city' berfungsi menjelaskan subjek 'Pompeii'.

structure.questionText: It is essential that every student ______ the exam rules.
structure.explanation: Subjunctive. Setelah 'essential that', verb harus dalam bentuk dasar (bare infinitive) untuk semua subjek.

structure.questionText: ______ determines the color of the eggshell is the breed of the hen.
structure.explanation: Noun Clause Subject. 'What determines...' adalah klausa yang berfungsi sebagai subjek kalimat.

structure.questionText: Not until the 20th century ______ widely understood.
structure.explanation: Inversion. 'Not until' di awal kalimat memicu inversi (Auxiliary + Subject). 'Was quantum mechanics'.

structure.questionText: ______ rapid spread of the disease was alarming.
structure.explanation: Missing Article. Dibutuhkan determiner untuk noun phrase 'rapid spread'. 'The' paling spesifik.

structure.questionText: Certain layers of the atmosphere allow radio waves ______ around the Earth.
structure.explanation: Infinitive. Pola 'allow + object + to infinitive'. Jadi 'allow... to travel'.

structure.questionText: ______ virtually no atmosphere on the Moon.
structure.explanation: Existential Sentence. 'Atmosphere' adalah uncountable (tunggal), jadi gunakan 'There is'.

structure.questionText: The first steam engine, ______ by James Watt, revolutionized industry.
structure.explanation: Reduced Adjective Clause. Aslinya 'which was developed'. Disingkat menjadi 'developed' (Past Participle).

structure.questionText: ______ gene in the human genome has a specific function.
structure.explanation: Quantifier. 'Gene' adalah singular noun. 'Every' diikuti singular noun, sedangkan opsi lain diikuti plural/uncountable.

structure.questionText: Prior to ______ the United States, immigrants must obtain a visa.
structure.explanation: Preposition + Gerund. Setelah preposisi 'to' (dalam frasa 'prior to'), gunakan V-ing.

structure.questionText: Of the two cars, the red one is ______.
structure.explanation: Comparative with 'The'. Jika hanya ada dua benda, gunakan 'the + comparative' (the faster).

structure.questionText: Rarely ______ seen such a beautiful sunset.
structure.explanation: Inversion. Adverb negatif 'Rarely' di awal kalimat memicu inversi. Gunakan 'have I' (Present Perfect).

structure.questionText: ______ is necessary for the body to function properly.
structure.explanation: Subject Selection. 'Sleep' (noun) adalah subjek yang paling natural dan ringkas di sini.

structure.questionText: The manager asked that the report ______ submitted by 5 PM.
structure.explanation: Subjunctive. Setelah 'asked that', verb harus bare infinitive ('be').

structure.questionText: ______ built in 1883, the Brooklyn Bridge is an engineering marvel.
structure.explanation: Reduced Clause. 'Although (it was) built...'. Ini menunjukkan pertentangan (tua tapi hebat).

structure.questionText: Neither the teacher nor the students ______ the answer.
structure.explanation: Subject-Verb Agreement. Dalam 'Neither...nor', verb mengikuti subjek terdekat ('students' = jamak). Jadi 'know'.

structure.questionText: The surface of Mars is covered with ______ red dust.
structure.explanation: Zero Article. 'Dust' adalah uncountable noun dan di sini bersifat umum, jadi tidak butuh artikel.

structure.questionText: Had I known about the traffic, I ______ earlier.
structure.explanation: Conditional Type 3. 'Had I known' = 'If I had known'. Result clause harus 'would have + V3'.

structure.questionText: ______ dolphins have no sense of smell is known to marine biologists.
structure.explanation: Noun Clause Subject. 'That dolphins have...' adalah klausa yang berfungsi sebagai subjek kalimat.

structure.questionText: The speed of light is ______ the speed of sound.
structure.explanation: Comparative. Dibutuhkan struktur komparatif lengkap 'much faster than'.

structure.questionText: Proteins are ______ of amino acids.
structure.explanation: Passive Voice. 'Are composed of' = terdiri dari.

structure.questionText: ______ rain, the picnic was canceled.
structure.explanation: Preposition. 'Rain' adalah noun. Gunakan 'Due to' (preposisi). Opsi lain adalah conjunction yang harus diikuti klausa.

structure.questionText: Most of the water on Earth ______ in the oceans.
structure.explanation: Subject-Verb Agreement. 'Water' adalah uncountable (tunggal). Jadi 'is'.

structure.questionText: Using a telescope, ______.
structure.explanation: Dangling Modifier. Frasa 'Using a telescope' harus diikuti oleh pelaku yang menggunakan teleskop tersebut ('we').

structure.questionText: ______ the fact that he was tired, he continued working.
structure.explanation: Preposition. 'Despite' diikuti noun phrase ('the fact that...').

structure.questionText: Mathematics ______ my favorite subject in school.
structure.explanation: Singular Noun. 'Mathematics' berakhiran 's' tapi tunggal. Gunakan 'was'.

structure.questionText: ______ a large amount of money was stolen from the bank.
structure.explanation: Adverb Modifier. 'Reportedly' memodifikasi seluruh kalimat/kata kerja.

structure.questionText: The cactus is a plant ______ adapted to dry conditions.
structure.explanation: Adverb usage. Participle 'adapted' harus dijelaskan oleh adverb 'well', bukan adjective 'good'.

structure.questionText: Unless ______, I will not go to the party.
structure.explanation: Reduced Clause. 'Unless (I am) invited...'. Gunakan Past Participle untuk makna pasif.

structure.questionText: ______ the best player on the team, Sarah was elected captain.
structure.explanation: Present Participle Phrase. 'Being the best player...' menjelaskan subjek 'Sarah'.

structure.questionText: The committee ______ usually hold their meetings on Tuesdays.
structure.explanation: Collective Noun. Di sini ada kata ganti 'their', menunjukkan anggota komite dianggap jamak (individuals). Maka gunakan 'do'.

structure.questionText: ______, penicillin is known as the first antibiotic.
structure.explanation: Frasa 'Discovered by Fleming' adalah past participle phrase yang berfungsi menjelaskan subjek 'penicillin'. Struktur ini benar untuk melengkapi kalimat.

structure.questionText: It is important that he ______ the doctor immediately.
structure.explanation: Subjunctive. Setelah 'important that', gunakan bare infinitive 'see'.

structure.questionText: The Statue of Liberty was a gift ______ friendship from France.
structure.explanation: Preposition. 'A gift of friendship' (hadiah persahabatan).

structure.questionText: ______ manufacturing, the country relies on agriculture.
structure.explanation: Prepositional Phrase. 'In addition to' (Selain) cocok secara makna dan gramatikal.

structure.questionText: Birds regulate their body temperature ______ feathers.
structure.explanation: Method. 'By + Gerund' digunakan untuk menunjukkan cara melakukan sesuatu.

structure.questionText: ______ appears to be no solution to the problem.
structure.explanation: Existential Subject. 'There appears to be...' adalah bentuk formal dari 'There is...'.

structure.questionText: The Mona Lisa is ______ painting in the world.
structure.explanation: Superlative. Dibutuhkan 'the most + adjective' untuk superlatif.

structure.questionText: ______ classified as a dwarf planet, Pluto has five known moons.
structure.explanation: Reduced Clause. 'Although (it is) classified...'.

structure.questionText: The more you learn, ______ you realize how little you know.
structure.explanation: Double Comparative. 'The more..., the more...'.

structure.questionText: ______ tea is the second most consumed drink in the world.
structure.explanation: Prepositional Phrase. 'After water' memberikan konteks urutan.

structure.questionText: The knee is the joint ______ the thigh bone meets the large bone of the lower leg.
structure.explanation: Relative Adverb. 'Where' digunakan untuk merujuk pada tempat atau lokasi fisik (persendian).

structure.questionText: ______ produce artificial rain, chemicals are spread by airplanes.
structure.explanation: Infinitive of Purpose. Gunakan 'To + Verb 1' di awal kalimat untuk menyatakan tujuan. 'To produce...'.

structure.questionText: If the oxygen supply in the atmosphere ______ replenished by plants, it would soon be exhausted.
structure.explanation: Conditional Sentence Type 2. Untuk pengandaian yang berlawanan dengan fakta saat ini, gunakan 'were' untuk semua subjek.

structure.questionText: ______ excellent art museums, Moscow has a world-famous ballet company.
structure.explanation: Connector. Kalimat ini menambahkan informasi positif (museum + ballet), jadi 'In addition to' adalah yang paling tepat.

structure.questionText: The onion is characterized by a strong sharp smell and taste ______.
structure.explanation: Reduced Adjective Clause. Aslinya 'which is caused by'. Disingkat menjadi Past Participle 'caused by'.

structure.questionText: Not only ______ atoms, but they also contain subatomic particles.
structure.explanation: Inversion. 'Not only' di awal kalimat mengharuskan inversi (Auxiliary + Subject + Verb).

structure.questionText: Generally, the thinnest part of the Earth's crust is ______ the oceans.
structure.explanation: Preposition. Dibutuhkan preposisi sederhana 'under' untuk menunjukkan lokasi.

structure.questionText: ______ two fingerprints have ever been found to be exactly the same.
structure.explanation: Negative Adjective. 'No' digunakan sebelum noun phrase ('two fingerprints').

structure.questionText: Computers that once took up entire rooms are now ______ to put on desktops.
structure.explanation: Adjective + Enough. Posisi 'enough' selalu diletakkan SETELAH kata sifat.

structure.questionText: ______ fats are essential to the human body, but too much can be harmful.
structure.explanation: Adjective/Subject Modifier. Dibutuhkan kata sifat untuk menjelaskan 'fats'. 'Dietary fats' (lemak makanan).

structure.questionText: The hard palate ______ between the mouth and the nose.
structure.explanation: Missing Verb. Kalimat ini sudah punya subjek 'The hard palate', butuh verb utama 'forms'.

structure.questionText: ______ the history of the tough, strong-willed Nebraska farmer.
structure.explanation: Simple Sentence. Dibutuhkan Subjek dan Verb. 'Willa Cather (S) wrote (V)'.

structure.questionText: Never before ______ seen such a rapid increase in technology.
structure.explanation: Inversion. Adverb negatif 'Never before' memicu inversi. Gunakan Present Perfect 'has the world'.

structure.questionText: ______ for their strong fiber include flax and hemp.
structure.explanation: Reduced Adjective Clause. Subjek kalimat adalah 'Plants (which are) grown for their strong fiber'. Verb utamanya adalah 'include'.

structure.questionText: ______ is the chemical element with the symbol Au.
structure.explanation: Simple Subject. Kalimat membutuhkan subjek noun 'Gold'.

structure.questionText: In the United States, ______ is the most common form of energy.
structure.explanation: Subject. Setelah frasa preposisi tempat, dibutuhkan subjek untuk verb 'is'. 'Electricity'.

structure.questionText: The Eiffel Tower is ______ famous landmark in Paris.
structure.explanation: Article. 'Famous' diawali bunyi konsonan, gunakan 'a'. Ini adalah penyebutan umum salah satu landmark.

structure.questionText: ______ she was tired, she finished the marathon.
structure.explanation: Conjunction. Diikuti klausa lengkap (S + V), gunakan 'Although'. 'Despite' untuk noun phrase.

structure.questionText: The study of rocks is ______ geology.
structure.explanation: Passive Voice. 'Is called' (disebut).

structure.questionText: ______ birds are able to fly, the ostrich cannot.
structure.explanation: Conjunction. 'While' menunjukkan pertentangan (Sementara kebanyakan burung bisa terbang...).

structure.questionText: ______ air is composed of nitrogen and oxygen.
structure.explanation: Zero Article. 'Air' adalah uncountable noun yang bersifat umum di sini.

structure.questionText: Only by working hard ______ achieve your goals.
structure.explanation: Inversion. 'Only by...' memicu inversi (Auxiliary + S + V).

structure.questionText: The Appalachian Mountains are ______ than the Rocky Mountains.
structure.explanation: Comparative. Adjective pendek + er + than.

structure.questionText: ______ gene in the body is unique.
structure.explanation: Quantifier. 'Gene' tunggal, jadi gunakan 'Each'. Yang lain untuk jamak.

structure.questionText: Before ______ to bed, I always brush my teeth.
structure.explanation: Preposition + Gerund. 'Before going'.

structure.questionText: ______ of the students passed the exam.
structure.explanation: Pronoun. 'None of the students' (tak satu pun). 'Every' tidak bisa diikuti 'of' secara langsung (harus 'Every one of'). 'Each of' benar tapi biasanya menekankan individu, 'None' lebih umum untuk negasi jamak di sini.

structure.questionText: The speed of sound is ______ than the speed of light.
structure.explanation: Comparative. 'Slower than'.

structure.questionText: ______ mammals, whales breathe air.
structure.explanation: Preposition. 'Like' (seperti) digunakan untuk membandingkan noun.

structure.questionText: It is essential that she ______ on time.
structure.explanation: Subjunctive. 'Essential that she be'.

structure.questionText: The sun ______ in the east.
structure.explanation: Simple Present Tense. General truth, subjek tunggal.

structure.questionText: ______ is a popular sport in Brazil.
structure.explanation: Zero Article. Nama olahraga tidak menggunakan artikel.

structure.questionText: The man ______ to the manager is my uncle.
structure.explanation: Reduced Adjective Clause. 'The man (who is) talking...'.

structure.questionText: ______ help you?
structure.explanation: Question Form. Modal + Subject + Verb.

structure.questionText: She is ______ intelligent student.
structure.explanation: Article. 'Intelligent' diawali bunyi vokal.

structure.questionText: ______ I know the answer, I cannot tell you.
structure.explanation: Conjunction. Menunjukkan pertentangan (Walaupun saya tahu...).

structure.questionText: The river ______ through the city.
structure.explanation: Simple Present. Subjek tunggal 'The river'.

structure.questionText: ______ I have a pen?
structure.explanation: Polite Request. 'May I have...'.

structure.questionText: The book ______ by Mark Twain.
structure.explanation: Passive Voice. Past Tense (was + V3).

structure.questionText: ______ students are in the classroom.
structure.explanation: Quantifier. 'Students' adalah countable plural. Gunakan 'Many'.

structure.questionText: I ______ to the store yesterday.
structure.explanation: Simple Past. Keterangan waktu 'yesterday'.

structure.questionText: The phone ______ while I was sleeping.
structure.explanation: Simple Past (interrupted action). 'Rang'.

structure.questionText: ______ car is parked outside?
structure.explanation: Possessive Question. 'Mobil siapa...'. Gunakan 'Whose'.

structure.questionText: He is ______ interesting person.
structure.explanation: Article. 'An interesting person'.

structure.questionText: They ______ soccer every weekend.
structure.explanation: Simple Present. Subjek 'They' jamak.

structure.questionText: ______ time is it?
structure.explanation: Question. 'What time...'.

structure.questionText: I ______ seen that movie before.
structure.explanation: Present Perfect. 'I have seen'.

structure.questionText: ______ is the capital of France?
structure.explanation: Question. 'Apa ibukota...'. Gunakan 'What'.

structure.questionText: The cat ______ on the mat.
structure.explanation: Simple Present. 'Sits' (atau Sat jika past, tapi Sits opsi paling standar untuk fakta/kebiasaan jika tanpa konteks waktu).

structure.questionText: ______ you like some coffee?
structure.explanation: Offer. 'Would you like...'.

structure.questionText: She ______ a teacher.
structure.explanation: To Be. Subjek 'She'. Gunakan 'is'.

structure.questionText: ______ widely used in the chemical industry, sodium carbonate is a principal ingredient in soap.
structure.explanation: Reduced Adverb Clause. Kalimat lengkapnya 'Though it is widely used...'. Konjungsi 'Though' diperlukan untuk menunjukkan konsesi.

structure.questionText: Just off the Massachusetts coast ______ a popular summer resort area.
structure.explanation: Inversion of Place. Keterangan tempat 'Just off...' di awal kalimat memicu inversi (Verb + Subject). '...is (V) Martha's Vineyard (S)'.

structure.questionText: The older the tree, ______ the rings in its trunk.
structure.explanation: Double Comparative. Pola 'The older..., the closer...'.

structure.questionText: Usually, the more skilled an athlete, ______ more money he or she earns.
structure.explanation: Double Comparative. Pola 'The more..., the more...'. Bagian kedua harus dimulai dengan 'the'.

structure.questionText: ______ tea plant are small and white.
structure.explanation: Subject-Verb Agreement. Verb-nya 'are' (jamak), jadi subjek harus jamak. 'The flowers (jamak) of the tea plant'.

structure.questionText: The tetracyclines, ______ antibiotics, are used to treat infections.
structure.explanation: Appositive. Frasa 'a family of antibiotics' menjelaskan subjek 'The tetracyclines' tanpa membutuhkan verb baru.

structure.questionText: Any possible academic assistance from taking stimulants ______ marginal at best.
structure.explanation: Simple Sentence. Subjek utamanya 'assistance' (tunggal), verb-nya 'is'.

structure.questionText: Henry Adams, born in Boston, ______ famous as a historian and novelist.
structure.explanation: Main Verb. Kalimat sudah punya subjek 'Henry Adams' dan modifier 'born in Boston'. Butuh verb utama 'became'.

structure.questionText: The major cause ______ the pull of the Moon on the Earth.
options: of the tides in the ocean
structure.explanation: Subject Completion. 'The major cause (of ocean tides) is...'. Pola Noun + Prepositional Phrase + Verb.

structure.questionText: Still a novelty in the late nineteenth century, ______ limited to the rich.
structure.explanation: Modifier. Frasa awal menjelaskan subjek. Subjek yang dijelaskan adalah 'photography'.

structure.questionText: The reactor core of a nuclear power plant is enclosed in concrete ______ radiation.
structure.explanation: Infinitive of Purpose. 'To prevent' (untuk mencegah).

structure.questionText: ______ political party in the United States.
structure.explanation: Negative Adjective. 'No' digunakan sebelum noun phrase.

structure.questionText: The committee has met and ______.
structure.explanation: Parallel Structure. 'Has met and (has) reached'. Subjek 'committee' dianggap tunggal (it) di sini.

structure.questionText: Juana Ines de la Cruz ______ a nun in 1667 to devote her life to writing.
structure.explanation: Simple Past. Butuh verb utama 'became' untuk subjek 'Juana...'.

structure.questionText: A premise is a statement ______ as a basis for reasoning.
structure.explanation: Reduced Adjective Clause. 'Which serves' menjadi 'serving'.

structure.questionText: Of all the cereals, rice is the one ______ food for more people than any other grain.
structure.explanation: Adjective Clause. 'The one that provides...'.

structure.questionText: ______ wooden buildings helps to protect them from damage due to weather.
structure.explanation: Gerund as Subject. 'Painting... helps...'.

structure.questionText: Not only ______ shade and beauty, but they also reduce carbon dioxide.
structure.explanation: Inversion. 'Not only' di awal kalimat -> 'do trees provide'.

structure.questionText: ______ in the atmosphere is the temperature falling below freezing.
structure.explanation: Noun Clause Subject. 'What produces frost' adalah subjek kalimat.

structure.questionText: Lambert's sunfish, a small freshwater fish, ______ for the distinctive red spot on its ear.
structure.explanation: Passive Voice. 'Is named' (dinamai).

structure.questionText: Unless protected areas are established, the Bengal tiger ______ extinct.
structure.explanation: Conditional/Modal. 'Might become' menunjukkan kemungkinan.

structure.questionText: Before the 1800s, ______ of cotton was done by hand.
structure.explanation: Gerund/Noun Phrase. 'The picking of cotton' adalah subjek.

structure.questionText: Unlike the Earth, which rotates once every twenty-four hours, ______ once every ten hours.
structure.explanation: Comparison. Membandingkan 'The Earth' dengan 'Jupiter'. Struktur S + V ('Jupiter rotates').

structure.questionText: Jacksonville, Florida, ______ to be the largest city in the United States.
structure.explanation: Main Verb. 'Jacksonville... claims...'.

structure.questionText: The skull of a mammal ______ of different bones.
structure.explanation: Passive Phrasal Verb. 'Is made up of' (terdiri dari).

structure.questionText: Using a globe can be ______ to visualize the geography of the world.
structure.explanation: Comparative (Implied). Lebih mudah (daripada peta datar). 'Easier'.

structure.questionText: Only when the ground is kept moist ______ germinate.
structure.explanation: Inversion. 'Only when...' -> 'will grass seeds germinate'.

structure.questionText: Glass that has been tempered may be up to ______.
options: five times as hard as ordinary glass
as hard as ordinary glass five times
harder as ordinary glass five times
ordinary glass as hard as five times
structure.explanation: Multiple Number Comparison. 'Five times as hard as...'.

structure.questionText: Arizona ______ a very dry climate.
structure.explanation: Simple Sentence. 'Arizona (S) has (V)'.

structure.questionText: One of the most important tools ______ by geologists is the hammer.
structure.explanation: Reduced Adjective Clause. 'Tools (which are) used...'.

structure.questionText: Native American languages are often ______ than European languages.
structure.explanation: Comparative. Ada 'than', jadi 'more complex'.

structure.questionText: Duncan Mayo, ______ of the early west, was actually born in Scotland.
structure.explanation: Appositive. Frasa benda yang menjelaskan subjek.

structure.questionText: X-rays are able to pass through objects ______ visible light cannot.
structure.explanation: Relative Pronoun/Connector. 'That' menghubungkan dua klausa yang kontras.

structure.questionText: ______ to the Moon, the Apollo astronauts took many photographs.
structure.explanation: Prepositional Phrase. 'On their way to the Moon' (Dalam perjalanan mereka ke Bulan).

structure.questionText: Gunpowder, in some ways the most effective of all the explosive substances, ______ a mixture of potassium nitrate, charcoal, and sulfur.
structure.explanation: Subject-Verb Agreement. Subjek 'Gunpowder' (tunggal) -> 'is'.

structure.questionText: If water is heated to 212 degrees Fahrenheit, ______ as steam.
structure.explanation: Conditional Type 0/1. 'It boils and escapes' (General Truth).

structure.questionText: The North Platte River ______ from Wyoming into Nebraska.
structure.explanation: Simple Present. 'The river (S) flows (V)'.

structure.questionText: ______ Biloxi received its name from a Sioux word meaning 'first people'.
structure.explanation: Subject Completion. 'The city of Biloxi' (Kota Biloxi).

structure.questionText: A pride of lions ______ up to forty lions.
structure.explanation: Modal Verb. 'A pride (S) can contain (V)'.

structure.questionText: A computer is usually chosen because of its simplicity of operation and ease of maintenance ______ its capacity to store information.
structure.explanation: Conjunction. 'As well as' (dan juga/serta) menghubungkan frasa benda setara.

structure.questionText: In a basketball game a player ______ bounce the ball.
structure.explanation: Modal Verb. 'Must' diikuti bare infinitive 'bounce'. 'Needs' butuh 'to', 'Ought' butuh 'to'.

structure.questionText: ______ gene in the human genome is unique.
structure.explanation: Quantifier. 'Gene' tunggal, gunakan 'Every'.

structure.questionText: The moon ______ around the earth.
structure.explanation: Simple Present. Subjek tunggal 'The moon' -> 'revolves'.

structure.questionText: ______ created the first nuclear reactor.
structure.explanation: Simple Sentence. Butuh subjek orang 'Enrico Fermi'.

structure.questionText: Pandas ______ bamboo.
structure.explanation: Adverb Position. Adverb 'mainly' sebelum verb 'eat'.

structure.questionText: The temperature at which water boils ______ with altitude.
structure.explanation: Subject-Verb Agreement. Subjek 'The temperature' (tunggal) -> 'varies'.

structure.questionText: ______ light travels faster than sound is a well-known fact.
structure.explanation: Noun Clause Subject. 'That light travels...' adalah subjek.

structure.questionText: The United States consists of fifty states, ______ has its own government.
structure.explanation: Adjective Clause / Quantifier. 'Each of which' menghubungkan dua klausa dan merujuk pada 'states'.

structure.questionText: ______ microscopic, bacteria are essential to life.
structure.explanation: Reduced Clause. 'Although (they are) microscopic...'.

structure.questionText: Oxygen, ______ nitrogen, is a gas found in the atmosphere.
structure.explanation: Preposition. 'Like' (seperti) digunakan untuk perbandingan noun.

structure.questionText: The North Platte River ______ from Wyoming into Nebraska.
structure.explanation: Missing Verb. Kalimat ini membutuhkan kata kerja utama (verb) untuk subjek 'The North Platte River'. 'Flows' adalah verb yang tepat.

structure.questionText: ______ Biloxi received its name from a Sioux word meaning 'first people'.
structure.explanation: Missing Subject. Kalimat ini sudah memiliki verb 'received', sehingga membutuhkan subjek di awal kalimat. 'The city of' berfungsi sebagai subjek.

structure.questionText: A pride of lions ______ up to forty lions, including one to three males, several females, and cubs.
structure.explanation: Missing Verb. Subjek 'A pride' (singular) membutuhkan verb. 'Can contain' adalah verb phrase yang benar.

structure.questionText: _______ tea plant are small and white.
structure.explanation: Missing Subject. Verb-nya adalah 'are' (plural), jadi kita butuh subjek plural. 'The flowers of the' menyediakan subjek 'flowers' yang sesuai.

structure.questionText: The tetracyclines, _______ antibiotics, are used to treat infections.
structure.explanation: Appositive. Frasa di antara koma menjelaskan subjek 'The tetracyclines'. Dibutuhkan noun phrase (appositive), bukan verb utuh.

structure.questionText: Any possible solution to the Irish question not only _______ on the good will of the British but also on the patience of the Irish.
structure.explanation: Subject-Verb Agreement. Subjek 'Any possible solution' (singular) memerlukan verb singular. 'Depends' adalah pilihan yang tepat.

structure.questionText: The stronger the magnet, _______.
structure.explanation: Double Comparative. Pola 'The + comparative ..., the + comparative ...'. Jawaban yang mengikuti pola ini adalah 'the greater the magnetic field'.

structure.questionText: Scientists are now beginning to conduct experiments on ______ trigger different sorts of health risks.
structure.explanation: Noun Clause. Setelah preposisi 'on', dibutuhkan noun clause. 'How noise pollution can' membentuk noun clause yang benar sebagai objek preposisi.

structure.questionText: The knee is the joint ______ the thigh bone meets the large bone of the lower leg.
structure.explanation: Adjective Clause Connector. Mengacu pada tempat (the joint), konektor yang tepat adalah 'where'.

structure.questionText: Burning coal and oil releases poisonous gases into the air, _______ the earth's atmosphere.
structure.explanation: Present Participle Phrase. Digunakan untuk menunjukkan hasil atau aksi bersamaan dari klausa utama. 'Polluting' menjelaskan efek dari 'releases poisonous gases'.

structure.questionText: _______ several years for bamboo seeds to grow into plants that can be used for commercial purposes.
structure.explanation: It takes expression. Pola umum untuk menyatakan durasi waktu adalah 'It takes + time + to verb'.

structure.questionText: Arthur Millers play Death of a Salesman is the tragic story of a man destroyed by his own hollow values and _______ .
structure.explanation: Parallel Structure. 'hollow values' adalah noun phrase, jadi pasangannya setelah 'and' juga harus noun phrase tanpa preposisi tambahan.

structure.questionText: During the 19th century, heat was considered _______ a substance called caloric.
structure.explanation: Verb Pattern. Kata kerja 'considered' sering diikuti oleh to infinitive 'to be' (considered to be).

structure.questionText: Not only _______ generate energy, but it also produces fuel for other fission reactors.
options: it is a nuclear breeder reactor
structure.explanation: Inversion. Kalimat dimulai dengan 'Not only', sehingga memerlukan inversi (Auxiliary + Subject + Verb). 'does a nuclear breeder reactor' adalah bentuk yang benar.

structure.questionText: D.W. Griffith pioneered many of the stylistic features and filmmaking techniques _______ as the Hollywood standard.
structure.explanation: Adjective Clause. 'That became established' menjelaskan 'techniques'. Pilihan 'what' tidak bisa digunakan sebagai adjective clause connector untuk noun.

structure.questionText: _______ be needed, the water basin would need to be dammed.
structure.explanation: Conditionals (Inversion). Ini adalah bentuk inversi dari 'If hydroelectric power should be needed'. 'If' dihilangkan dan 'Should' dipindah ke depan.

structure.questionText: _______ in the atmosphere is the temperature falling below freezing.
structure.explanation: Noun Clause as Subject. Kalimat ini membutuhkan subjek. 'What produces frost' berfungsi sebagai subjek klausa (Noun Clause).

structure.questionText: Mallard ducks are known _______ and to build their nests near water.
structure.explanation: Parallel Structure / Verb Pattern. 'Are known' diikuti to infinitive ('to fly'), yang juga paralel dengan 'to build' setelah 'and'.

structure.questionText: The discovery of the halftone process in 1881 made it _______ for photographs to be reproduced in books and newspapers.
structure.explanation: Adjective usage. Pola 'made it + adjective + for someone/something'. Adjective 'possible' adalah kata yang tepat.

structure.questionText: Only in the last few years ______ to use home computers.
structure.explanation: Inversion. Kalimat dimulai dengan 'Only in...', expression of place/time yang membatasi, sehingga memerlukan inversi (Aux + S + V).

structure.questionText: Not until the discovery of fire _______ to cook food.
structure.explanation: Inversion. Kalimat dimulai dengan frasa negatif 'Not until', sehingga memerlukan inversi (Auxiliary + Subject + Verb). 'did people learn' adalah bentuk yang benar.

structure.questionText: The director of the program advised the students _______ on time.
structure.explanation: Infinitive. Kata kerja 'advise' diikuti oleh object + to infinitive. Polanya adalah 'advise someone to do something'.

structure.questionText: _______ business managers plan the tasks that their employees are to carry out.
structure.explanation: Zero Article/Generalization. 'Business managers' di sini merujuk pada manajer secara umum (plural noun), jadi tidak membutuhkan artikel 'The' atau subjek tambahan 'It is/They are' karena kalimat sudah memiliki struktur yang lengkap.

structure.questionText: The giant panda resembles the bear, _______ that it creates a distinct family of its own.
structure.explanation: Compound Sentence. Dibutuhkan konjungsi (but) dan klausa lengkap (subject + verb) untuk menghubungkan dua ide yang bertentangan.

structure.questionText: _______ of the loud noise, the students could not concentrate on their exam.
structure.explanation: Preposition. 'The loud noise' adalah noun phrase, bukan klausa. Oleh karena itu, kita membutuhkan preposisi 'Because of', bukan konjungsi 'Because'.

structure.questionText: To generate income, magazine publishers must decide whether to increase the subscription price or _______.
structure.explanation: Parallel Structure. Setelah 'whether', ada 'to increase' (to infinitive). Maka setelah 'or', bentuknya juga harus 'to sell' (to infinitive).

structure.questionText: The Great Barrier Reef is _______ in the world.
structure.explanation: Superlative. Untuk menyatakan 'paling' di dunia, gunakan 'the + superlative adjective'. 'The largest' adalah bentuk yang tepat.

structure.questionText: _______ a bridge involves a complex balance of materials, physics, and design.
structure.explanation: Gerund as Subject. Subjek kalimat ini adalah sebuah aktivitas, jadi menggunakan Gerund (V-ing) 'Building' adalah yang paling tepat.

structure.questionText: If the oxygen supply in the atmosphere _______ plentiful, life as we know it would not exist.
structure.explanation: Conditional Sentence Type 2. Untuk pengandaian fakta saat ini (unreal present), 'be' selalu menjadi 'were' untuk semua subjek.

structure.questionText: Lasers are indispensable tools in medicine, _______ for delicate eye surgeries.
structure.explanation: Reduced Adjective Clause (Past Participle). Kalimat aslinya adalah 'which are used'. Dalam bentuk reduced, 'which are' dihilangkan, menyisakan 'used'.

structure.questionText: Alexander Graham Bell meant _______ a hearing aid but invented the telephone instead.
structure.explanation: Verb Pattern. Kata kerja 'mean' (bermaksud) diikuti oleh to infinitive. 'Meant to invent'.

structure.questionText: _______ is indispensable to the functioning of the ecosystem.
structure.explanation: Uncountable Noun. 'Water' sebagai zat umum (generalization) tidak memerlukan artikel 'the' atau 'a', dan tidak berbentuk jamak.

structure.questionText: The harder you study, _______ you will likely perform on the test.
structure.explanation: Double Comparative. Pola 'The + comparative, the + comparative'. Pasangan 'The harder' adalah 'the better'.

structure.questionText: _______ native to North America, the tomato is now cultivated worldwide.
structure.explanation: Reduced Clause Connector. 'Although (it is) native...'. 'Although' adalah conjunction yang tepat untuk diikuti adjektiva/klausa tereduksi. 'Despite' harus diikuti noun phrase.

structure.questionText: The committee suggested that the regulations _______ immediately.
structure.explanation: Subjunctive. Verb seperti 'suggest' diikuti 'that' clause menggunakan verb dasar (bare infinitive). Bentuk pasifnya adalah 'be + V3' (be enforced).

structure.questionText: Rarely _______ such a spectacular sunset as the one we saw yesterday.
structure.explanation: Inversion. Kata negatif 'Rarely' di awal kalimat memicu inversi. Karena kejadiannya lampau (saw yesterday), gunakan 'did we see'.

structure.questionText: The Statue of Liberty was a gift of friendship _______ the people of France to the people of the United States.
structure.explanation: Preposition. Pasangan yang tepat untuk menunjukkan asal pemberian adalah 'from ... to ...'.

structure.questionText: _______ primarily a plant-eater, the grizzly bear also eats flesh.
structure.explanation: Conjunction/Reduced Clause. Dibutuhkan kata hubung pertentangan untuk menghubungkan 'plant-eater' dan 'eats flesh'. 'Although (it is)...' adalah pilihan tepat.

structure.questionText: Only after the invention of the microscope _______ capable of understanding the structure of cells.
structure.explanation: Inversion. Frasa 'Only after...' di awal kalimat memicu inversi (Aux + S + V). 'did scientists become' adalah struktur yang benar.

structure.questionText: It is generally believed that an MBA degree _______ a good stepping stone for a career in management.
structure.explanation: Subject-Verb. Klausa 'that an MBA degree...' membutuhkan verb utama. Subjeknya 'an MBA degree' (singular), maka verb-nya 'is'.
